name: Miniature PlayStation Sound Format File
summary: Learn about .MINIPSF2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The Nullsoft Winamp and XMPlay applications all require the Highly Experimental plugin.

description: File created to play audio, similar to a .PSF2 file; contains imported sequence data for songs from .PSFLIB2 files located in the same directory; in order to work properly, MINIPSF2 files must be able to access driver code and sound banks from PSFLIB2 files; can be zlib compressed to save space and increase efficiency; commonly used by Sony PlayStation 2, a video game console; newer version of the .MINIPSF file.
